text.div:
Observation Result Status Codes Interpretation

Code Description Comment Version
A Amended based on adjustments provided by the Placer (Physician) regarding patient demographics (such as age and/or gender or other patient specific information added v2.8
B Appended Report - Final results reviewed and further information provided for clarity without change to the original result values. added v2.8
C Record coming over is a correction and thus replaces a final result added v2.2
D Deletes the OBX record from v2.1
F Final results from v2.1
I Specimen in lab; results pending from v2.1
N Not asked; used to affirmatively document that the observation identified in the OBX was not sought when the universal service ID in OBR-4 implies that it would be sought. added v2.3.1
O Order detail description only (no result) added v2.3.1
P Preliminary results added v2.2
R Results entered -- not verified from v2.1
S Partial results. Deprecated. Retained only for backward compatibility as of V2.6. Deprecated. from v2.1
U Results status change to final without retransmitting results already sent as 'preliminary.' E.g., radiology changes status from preliminary to final added v2.2
V Verified - Final results reviewed and confirmed to be correct, no change to result value, normal range or abnormal flag added v2.8
W Post original as wrong, e.g., transmitted for wrong patient added v2.3.1
X Results cannot be obtained for this observation added v2.2

name: v2.0085
title: v2 OBSERVATION RESULT STATUS
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0085 ( OBSERVATION RESULT STATUS)

concept.display: Amended based on adjustments provided by the Placer (Physician) regarding patient demographics (such as age and/or gender or other patient specific information

designation.value: Aangevuld op basis van aanpassingen van de Placer (Arts) met betrekking tot patiënt demografie (zoals leeftijd en/of geslacht of andere patiënt-specifieke informatie

concept.display: Appended Report - Final results reviewed and further information provided for clarity without change to the original result values.

designation.value: Aangevuld verslag - Definitieve resultaten en verdere informatie gegeven voor duidelijkheid zonder dat de oorspronkelijke resultaatwaarden wijzigen

concept.display: Record coming over is a correction and thus replaces a final result

designation.value: Dit record is een correctie en vervangt het definitief resultaat
Probe im Labor - Ergebnisse stehen an

concept.display: Not asked; used to affirmatively document that the observation identified in the OBX was not sought when the universal service ID in OBR-4 implies that it would be sought.

designation.value: Niet gevraagd; gebruikt om op schrift te stellen dat de observatie geïdentificeerd in de OBX niet werd gevraagd toen de universal section ID in OBR-4 implicileerde dat deze wel werd gezocht.

concept.display: Partial results.   Deprecated. Retained only for backward compatibility as of V2.6.

designation.value: Gedeeltelijke resultaten. Vervallen. Alleen voor backward compatibiliteit sinds V2.6

concept.display: Results status change to final without retransmitting results already sent as 'preliminary.'  E.g., radiology changes status from preliminary to final

designation.value: Vorläufiges Ergebnis wird Endergebnis, da keine Änderung
Result statuswijziging naar Definitief zonder de voorlopige resultaten opnieuw te sturen. Bijv. radiologie wijzigt status van voorlopig naar definitief

concept.display: Verified - Final results reviewed and confirmed to be correct, no change to result value, normal range or abnormal flag

designation.value: Geverifieerd - Definitieve resultaten gereviewd en correct bevonden, geen wijziging aan resultaatwaarde, normaalwaarde of abnormaal indicatie

concept.display: Post original as wrong, e.g., transmitted for wrong patient

designation.value: Oorspronkelijke resultaten verkeerd verstuurd, bijv. voor verkeerde patiënt

concept.display: Results cannot be obtained for this observation

designation.value: Resultaten kunnen niet worden opgehaald voor deze observatie
